targets.queryText:
SELECT
 cycle,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'transfer' THEN event END) AS transfer,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'copy-job-database' THEN event END) AS "copy-job-database"
FROM task_events
WHERE event = 'succeeded'
GROUP BY cycle;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
 cycle,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'transfer' THEN event END) AS transfer,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'copy-job-database' THEN event END) AS "copy-job-database"
FROM task_events
WHERE event = 'succeeded'
GROUP BY cycle;

targets.queryText:
SELECT
 cycle,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'make-pp-scripts' THEN event END) AS 'make-pp-scripts',
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'run-pp1' THEN event END) AS 'run-pp1'
FROM task_events
WHERE event = 'succeeded'
GROUP BY cycle;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
 cycle,
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'make-pp-scripts' THEN event END) AS 'make-pp-scripts',
 MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'run-pp1' THEN event END) AS 'run-pp1'
FROM task_events
WHERE event = 'succeeded'
GROUP BY cycle;
